mapper.select: SELECT ccd.`number`,cct.`id` as cctid ,ccd.`name`,ccd.`phone`, cct.`clientType` as cctclienttype ,cct.`validty` as cctvalidty ,ccd.`integral` ,ccd.`balance` , cct.`startTime` as cctstarttime ,cct.`endTime` cctendtime FROM `client_clientdata` AS ccd STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_clienttype` AS cct ON ccd.`typeId` = cct.`id` WHERE ccd.`number` LIKE #{id}
mapper.sql: number, name, linkMan, phone, address, bornDate, paymentDays, paymentSize, integral, balance, counselorId, counselorName, advisorytelephone, province, city, county, remark, taxpayerNumber, regosterPhone, bank, bankNumber, registerAddress, rest, typeId, startTime, endTime, date, password, default1, default2, default3, default4, default5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from client_clientdata
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into client_clientdata (number, name, linkMan, phone, address, bornDate, paymentDays, paymentSize, integral, balance, counselorId, counselorName, advisorytelephone, province, city, county, remark, taxpayerNumber, regosterPhone, bank, bankNumber, registerAddress, rest, typeId, startTime, endTime, date, password, default1, default2, default3, default4, default5 ) values (#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borndate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{paymentdays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentsize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{counselorid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{counselorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advisorytelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxpayernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regosterphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{banknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeraddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{default1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{default2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{default3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{default4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{default5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
